prog: (Haskell)import Data.List ((\\))a005242 n = a005242_list !! (n-1)a005242_list = f [1..] 0 0 where   f (x:xs) y z = x : f (xs \\ [x + y, x + y + z]) x y-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 23 2013
